# AIOTs Expanded <img src="https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/597633988802117642/985326334219804672/aiotexpanded_large.png" align="right" width="160"/>
A fabric add-on mod for [Basic AIOTs](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/basic-aiots) that aims to greatly expand compatibility with other mods

<a href="https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/aiots-expanded-fabric"><img src="http://cf.way2muchnoise.eu/full_632976_downloads.svg"></a> <a href="https://modrinth.com/mod/aiotsexpanded"><img src="https://img.shields.io/badge/dynamic/json?color=5da545&label=%E2%80%8B&labelColor=cecece&query=downloads&suffix=%20downloads&url=https%3A%2F%2Fapi.modrinth.com%2Fapi%2Fv1%2Fmod%2Faiotsexpanded&logo=data:image/svg+xml;base64,"></a>

Currently supported mods include:
- [Mythic Metals](https://modrinth.com/mod/mythicmetals)
- [BetterEnd](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/betterend)
- [BetterNether](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/betternether)
- [Advanced Netherite](https://modrinth.com/mod/advanced-netherite)
- [Warden Loot](https://www.curseforge.com/minecraft/mc-mods/warden-loot)

With many more planned

<img src="https://media.discordapp.net/attachments/597633988802117642/992897298415759480/aiots.png" width="450"/>

Credits:

[Luligabi12](https://www.curseforge.com/members/luligabi12/projects) for template textures/mod icon

All of the respective mod authors for the original tool-set textures

<sub>Note: I am not affiliated with the author of the Basic AIOTs mod</sub>
